titleInfo.title: Century II Promotions Talent Agency Half Sheet Advertisement (18387)

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this file, contact print@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite image information in email.
mods.abstract: Two color half sheet (red and black on green) advertising Century II Promotions Talent Agency and the musical acts signed on with them. Acts include Waylon Jennings, Tammy Wynette, Judy Lynn, Ronnie Milsap, Doug Kershaw, Donna Fargo, Barbara Mandrell, Mac Wiseman, Mel Street, Brenda Lee, Margo Smith, Marty Robbins, Tommy Overstreet, and the Statler Brothers. Poster features metal photoplates of all the acts. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/41730/

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
